import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function CourseItem({ thumbnail, badge, badgeClass, user, heart, share, title, slug, short_description, avatarAlt, avatarImageUrl, teacher, }) { return (
{badge}
{user}
{heart}
{share}
{title}

{short_description}

{teacher?.avatar?.thumbnail["thumbnail-2"] || ""}
Đăng Ký
); }
